author: demiurgos_23
content: when can we expect this to be merged and to have an Eip for Eof v1.1 ?

author: chfast
content: We want to merge these to existing EIPs but this will be confirmed during the call this week.

author: jwasinger
content:
To give an idea of what performance we could expect:

I've partially implemented 6601 in Geth, restricting modulus/input sizes to 321-384 bits and using x86 assembly for `ADDMODX`/`SUBMODX`/`MULMODX`.  Comparing performance of my EVM bls12381 G1/G2 mul implementations with corresponding Go implementation (no platform-specific assembly), the EVM implementation is only 30%, 45% slower for G2 and G1 mul respectively.

author: jwasinger
content: gas cost for g1/g2 mul in the EVM implementation on the average case is ~32000/70000 for naive double-and-add ecmul algorithm
